Text: Tesla was great...this rip is not nor the commentary .. made to make money ,this crappy documentary focuses on all the wrong things about the genius and features a grinning smiley guy that thinks he is cool, interviewing forgotten nobodies of the "scientific "and military circles of the Reagan era ..

It's from 1983.... It is a rare gem.  They interview people that were close friends of Nikola Tesla and were witnesses to government agents raiding his home after his death and taking private notes.  It also features info on man-made UFO technology from T. Townsend Brown and others.  It's from an old VHS source, so don't expect High Definition...
